extension.summary: Yatse repository for Kodi helper addons
extension.description: This repository contains scripts and plugins to help Yatse do things that may not be possible to do from JSON api.

extension.summary: Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi.
Resolver enlaces a videos de sitios populares para poder reproducirlos en XBMC/Kodi.
Prilagodi najčešće URL-ove video izvora kako bi radili u XBMC/Kodiju.
extension.description: Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi, simplify addon development of video plugins requiring multi video hosts.
Prilagodi najčešće URL-ove video izvora kako bi radili u XBMC/Kodiju, pojednostavnjuje razvoj priključaka za video dodatke koji zahtjevaju višestruke video izvore.
Скрипт для помощи работы Yatse в Kodi
extension.news: 1.2.0: YoutubeDL is no more optional and used first to gather metadata and provide better integration with Yatse 8.2.5 1.1.0: Fix some magnet not working + add support for YATP torrent plugin. 1.0.9: Fix possible issue with YoutubeDL and errors + Always fallback to try to play the url in case it's actually playable. 1.0.8: Add German translation. 1.0.7: Add support for Youtube-dl module as a secondary url resolver.
